price: İşte burada yardım ve dostluk, ancak Hak olan Allah'a mahsustur. Mükâfatı en iyi olan O, en güzel âkıbeti veren yine O'dur.
arabic: هُنَالِكَ ٱلۡوَلَٰيَةُ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ هُوَ خَيۡرٞ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٌ عُقۡبٗا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: hunālika al-walāyatu lillahi al-ḥaqi huwa khayrun thawāban wakhayrun ʿuq'ban
